overview:
The Novalnet AG is a leading financial institution which provides a complete range of services for secure and professional online payments around the globe, by using a single account for all kinds of necessary payments.

Company”s goal is, instead of a “one size fits all” product, to provide an individual and all inclusive Service which covers all requirements of your payment department such as Payment processing, Fraud Prevention, Subscription & Member Management, Affiliate System, collection clearing, technical department etc.

Advantages of Novalnet Services are: • no setup fee • no monthly fee • low transactional costs • one platform for all payment types • numerous fraud prevention techniques • free technical support • flexible payment interface • extensive administration interface with cost free implementation • free real-time monitoring • attractive and flexible pay out methods • free accounts receivable management process in case of failure of payment • safer and faster payment process with high usability • payment platform for multi-level affiliate marketing • User stays entirely on the merchant website for payment (no redirect to third party sites)
